pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor configuration 6 by SSCI.

content.raw: The reason for the split is that there are some launch files (eg. cloudsim_sim.ign) that should not launch any ROS nodes. The spawn scripts in `competition.ign` are meant to handle all the different configurations for the vehicles. For team submissions, the spawn script should only handle one configuration, so there is no need for passed in parameters other than the ones in the function signatures (_name, _modelURI, _worldName, _x, _y, _z, _roll, _pitch, _yaw).
content.html: The reason for the split is that there are some launch files (eg. cloudsim_sim.ign) that should not launch any ROS nodes. The spawn scripts in competition.ign are meant to handle all the different configurations for the vehicles. For team submissions, the spawn script should only handle one configuration, so there is no need for passed in parameters other than the ones in the function signatures (_name, _modelURI, _worldName, _x, _y, _z, _roll, _pitch, _yaw).
